title: Do you suck at URF? Do you want a good W/L ratio?
body:
http://i.gyazo.com/8de6a182a9076d1d11bfed80b2840306.png
http://i.gyazo.com/4967f5dc5f62de13a026075b9a91c538.png

Orianna will carry you to high ELO in URF.

replies.body:
My first URF win!
Thanks Sackboy :D.

> [{quoted}](name=Skyprus,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Y5lsjpAv,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-04-04T08:33:49.424+0000)
>
> My first URF win!
> Thanks Sackboy :D.

Rush Luduns.

Ludens > t2 boots > Deathcap  > Zhonyas > the penetrating staff that gives magic pen > then rhalis or go for gunblade, w/e.
urf was made to have fun guyz, try out moar champs while its still here

> [{quoted}](name=XSirCution,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Y5lsjpAv,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-04-03T07:12:49.765+0000)
>
> urf was made to have fun guyz, try out moar champs while its still here

Exactly, it was made to have fun, and I'm having fun playing Orianna.

I know, i didnt say shouldnt play ori :P
just said try out moar champs
This. Have been playing pretty much all Ori in URF just because she is so much fun xD.

> [{quoted}](name=Exlex,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Y5lsjpAv,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-03T06:04:22.368+0000)
>
> This. Have been playing pretty much all Ori in URF just because she is so much fun xD.

She's fun as hell, and just decimates when you can play her well, in URF it's just 100x easier to play her and dominate.

lux is also really really easy. and you dont have to worry about the fact moving the ball is about as long as the CD of abilities.


more importantly, is anyone else having massive lag issues when playing only urf? it feels like playing on NA again...

> [{quoted}](name=KingDinger,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Y5lsjpAv,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-04-03T06:12:43.494+0000)
>
> lux is also really really easy. and you dont have to worry about the fact moving the ball is about as long as the CD of abilities.
> 
> 
> more importantly, is anyone else having massive lag issues when playing only urf? it feels like playing on NA again...

I have periodic moments where I cannot move, but majority of the time I'm fine.
